hero.headline: Plumbing Done
hero.description: Licensed plumbers serving {{city}} with fast, reliable service. From leaky faucets to full repiping, {{businessName}} gets the job done with no mess and no stress.

items.label: Licensed & Insured
items.value: Fully licensed plumbers with comprehensive insurance coverage.

items.label: No-Mess Guarantee
items.value: We leave your home as clean as we found it — every time.

items.label: Upfront Pricing
items.value: Honest quotes before work begins. No hidden fees, ever.

items.label: 24/7 Emergency
items.value: Water emergencies don't wait — neither do we.

processSection.headline: How It Works
processSection.description: Getting professional plumbing service in {{city}} is simple.

steps.title: Call or Book Online
steps.description: Describe your plumbing issue and we'll schedule a convenient time.

steps.title: On-Site Diagnosis
steps.description: Our licensed plumber inspects the problem and provides an upfront quote.

steps.title: Professional Repair
steps.description: We fix the issue right the first time using quality parts and proven methods.

steps.title: Problem Solved
steps.description: Enjoy peace of mind with our {{warrantyYears}}-year warranty on all work.

aboutSection.description: {{businessName}} has been serving {{city}} and the {{region}} since {{establishedYear}}. With {{reviewCount}}+ five-star reviews and a team of licensed, experienced plumbers, we handle everything from routine repairs to complex installations. Our reputation for honest pricing, clean workmanship, and dependable service has made us one of {{city}}'s most trusted plumbing companies.
aboutSection.mission: To provide {{city}} homeowners with honest, dependable plumbing services they can count on — day or night.

values.title: Quality Workmanship
values.description: Every repair and installation is done to code and built to last.

values.title: Transparent Pricing
values.description: You'll know the exact cost before we turn a single wrench.

values.title: Respect for Your Home
values.description: Drop cloths, boot covers, and a thorough cleanup after every job.
